Member Function Documentation

wtModuleManager::wtModuleManager (  ) 

wtModuleManager::isCoreModule ( $  id  ) 

Checks if the module belongs to the core. Can be used before read().

Parameters:
$id The ID of the module
Returns:
TRUE if the module belongs to the core, otherwise FALSE.

wtModuleManager::checkModule ( $  id,
$  version = NULL,
$  installed = false 
)

Checks if the module is installed. This function can be used before read().

Parameters:
$id The ID of the module
$version Optional. A version number may be passed that the module needs to fit (equal or higher).
$installed If TRUE, only modules having the installed flag set will be checked.
Returns:
TRUE if the module is installed and the version equals $version (if passed), FALSE if the module is not installed, a positive value if the module is installed in a higher version than expected, a negative value if the module is installed in a lower version than expected .
